#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int p,n,t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		char a[5];
		int odd[504],even[503],i,j=0,k=0;
		scanf("%d%s%d",&n,a,&p);
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			 even[j++]=i;
			else
			 odd[k++]=i;
		}
		if(a[0]=='o')
		 printf("%d\n",even[p-1]);
		else
		 printf("%d\n",odd[p-1]);
	}
	return 0;
}
